alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 4:04AM EST until February 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Franklin, Clinton, and Western Essex Counties in New York. * WHEN...Until 7PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur between 6 AM and 3 PM today.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
